PokerPlayerMod:DiamondStrike.NAME: Diamond Strike
PokerPlayerMod:DiamondStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add a random pokerplayer:Diamond Card to your hand.

PokerPlayerMod:BadJoker.NAME: Bad Joker
PokerPlayerMod:BadJoker.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of !M! random Poker Cards. This becomes that card until the end of turn.

PokerPlayerMod:Mulligan.NAME: Mulligan
PokerPlayerMod:Mulligan.DESCRIPTION: Discard any number of cards. NL Draw cards until you have 5 cards in hand. NL Exhaust.
PokerPlayerMod:Mulligan.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard any number of cards. NL Draw cards until you have 5 cards in hand.

PokerPlayerMod:Manipulation.NAME: Manipulation
PokerPlayerMod:Manipulation.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. You may increase the pokerplayer:Rank of one Poker Card by X. NL Refund 1

PokerPlayerMod:HotShotCut.NAME: Hot Shot Cut
PokerPlayerMod:HotShotCut.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand. Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each exhausted Poker Card. NL Exhaust.
PokerPlayerMod:HotShotCut.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand. Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each exhausted card. NL Exhaust.

PokerPlayerMod:ClubsClub.NAME: Clubs Club
PokerPlayerMod:ClubsClub.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. NL Deal !D! damage for each pokerplayer:Club in your hand.

PokerPlayerMod:SecondChance.NAME: Second Chance
PokerPlayerMod:SecondChance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw a card. NL Repeat until you have 5 cards in hand.

PokerPlayerMod:Configure.NAME: Configure
PokerPlayerMod:Configure.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Put a card from your hand onto the top of your draw pile.

PokerPlayerMod:HiddenCard.NAME: Hidden Card
PokerPlayerMod:HiddenCard.DESCRIPTION: Fetch a Poker Card from your discard pile.
PokerPlayerMod:HiddenCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Fetch a Poker Card from your discard pile. Gain Block equal to its pokerplayer:Rank.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: There are no Poker Cards in my discard pile.

PokerPlayerMod:Extraction.NAME: Extraction
PokerPlayerMod:Extraction.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a Poker Card. Gain energy equal to its pokerplayer:Rank.

PokerPlayerMod:Raise.NAME: Raise
PokerPlayerMod:Raise.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. NL pokerplayer:Ranks of all Poker Cards in your hand are increased by !M!.

PokerPlayerMod:MagicTrick.NAME: Magic Trick
PokerPlayerMod:MagicTrick.DESCRIPTION: Draw until you have 6 cards in hand. NL Discard !M! card.
PokerPlayerMod:MagicTrick.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw until you have 7 cards in hand. NL Discard !M! cards.

PokerPlayerMod:DamnStraight.NAME: Damn Straight
PokerPlayerMod:DamnStraight.DESCRIPTION: Modifier Bonus from Straight is doubled.
PokerPlayerMod:DamnStraight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. NL Modifier Bonus from Straight is doubled.

PokerPlayerMod:Sharpen.NAME: Sharpen
PokerPlayerMod:Sharpen.DESCRIPTION: Your pokerplayer:Diamonds deal !M! more damage during pokerplayer:Showdown.
PokerPlayerMod:Sharpen.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. NL Your pokerplayer:Diamonds deal !M! more damage during pokerplayer:Showdown.

PokerPlayerMod:Round.NAME: Round
PokerPlayerMod:Round.DESCRIPTION: Your pokerplayer:Clubs give you !M! Block during pokerplayer:Showdown.
PokerPlayerMod:Round.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. NL Your pokerplayer:Clubs give you 2 Block during pokerplayer:Showdown.

PokerPlayerMod:Ace.NAME: Ace
PokerPlayerMod:Ace.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Poker Card with pokerplayer:Rank 1, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.
PokerPlayerMod:Ace.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. NL Whenever you play a Poker Card with pokerplayer:Rank 1, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

PokerPlayerMod:Splitter.NAME: Splitter
PokerPlayerMod:Splitter.DESCRIPTION: If the pokerplayer:Ranks of all Poker Cards in your hand are 5 or less during pokerplayer:Showdown, increase their pokerplayer:Rank by !M! .
PokerPlayerMod:Splitter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. NL If the pokerplayer:Ranks of all Poker Cards in your hand are 5 or less during pokerplayer:Showdown, increase their pokerplayer:Rank by !M! .

PokerPlayerMod:FakeSymbols.NAME: Fake Symbols
PokerPlayerMod:FakeSymbols.DESCRIPTION: You score a Flush if you have 4 or more Poker Cards with same suit during pokerplayer:Showdown.
PokerPlayerMod:FakeSymbols.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. NL You score a Flush if you have 4 or more Poker Cards with same suit during pokerplayer:Showdown.

PokerPlayerMod:WildCard.NAME: Wild Card
PokerPlayerMod:WildCard.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 from ALL Poker Cards to add into your hand. NL Exhaust.

PokerPlayerMod:VarietyAttack.NAME: Variety Attack
PokerPlayerMod:VarietyAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. Damage is doubled for each unique Suit of Poker Cards in your hand.

PokerPlayerMod:Duplicate.NAME: Duplicate
PokerPlayerMod:Duplicate.DESCRIPTION: Choose a Poker Card from your hand. Add a copy of that card into your hand.

PokerPlayerMod:GamblerForm.NAME: Gambler Form
PokerPlayerMod:GamblerForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of pokerplayer:Showdown, you may choose a Poker Card to randomize its pokerplayer:Rank between 6 and 10.
PokerPlayerMod:GamblerForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. NL At the start of pokerplayer:Showdown, you may choose a Poker Card to randomize its pokerplayer:Rank between 6 and 10.
